extensionDescription.message: Visually select web page sections and convert them to Markdown

popupStartSelectionMode.description: Button text to start selection mode

popupHistoryClearAll.description: Button text to clear all history

popupHistoryCopy.description: Button text to copy from history

popupHistoryDownload.description: Button text to download from history

popupHistoryLoadError.description: Error message when history fails to load

popupChromePageError.message:
This extension cannot be used on this page.
Please try on a regular web page.

popupScriptLoadError.message:
Failed to load scripts.
Please refresh the page and try again.
popupScriptLoadError.description: Error message when script injection fails

notificationAllCleared.description: Success notification for clearing all history

confirmClearAll.description: Confirmation message for clearing all history

toolbarInstruction.message: Select sections | Shift+Click: Multi-select | Shift+↑↓: Adjust range | ESC: Cancel
toolbarInstruction.description: Instruction text shown in top toolbar

toastNoContent.description: Toast error when no content is selected

toastEmptyContent.description: Toast error when converted content is empty

toastCopyFailed.description: Toast error prefix for copy failure

toastDownloadFailed.description: Toast error prefix for download failure

toastLibraryLoadFailed.message: Failed to load markdown conversion library
toastLibraryLoadFailed.description: Toast error when Turndown fails to load

timeJustNow.description: Relative time for less than 1 minute ago

sidepanelClearAll.description: Clear all button in side panel

sidepanelEmptyHint.message: Convert some content to see it here

sidepanelCopySuccess.description: Success notification for copy in side panel

sidepanelCopyError.description: Error notification for copy in side panel

sidepanelDownloadSuccess.description: Success notification for download in side panel

sidepanelDownloadError.description: Error notification for download in side panel

sidepanelDeleteSuccess.description: Success notification for delete in side panel

sidepanelDeleteError.description: Error notification for delete in side panel

sidepanelClearSuccess.description: Success notification for clear all in side panel

sidepanelClearError.description: Error notification for clear all in side panel

sidepanelConfirmClearAll.description: Confirmation message for clear all in side panel

sidepanelRefreshed.description: Notification for refresh in side panel

sidepanelLoadError.description: Error notification for loading history in side panel
